name: The Cursed One: Part I
description:
“The Cursed One” is an independent video game in the adventure and roleplay genre.

In this original fantasy game the player experiences the story of Ellie, a girl foreseen to bring destruction to her world. But Ellie is a kind soul and when a disaster draws near, she sets out to save the world and disprove the prophecy.

The player must solve puzzles, interact with NPCs and advance in battle in order to answer the question: Can you outrun a prophecy?

  • Explore the world and solve puzzles
  • Talk to NPCs and unfold the story
  • Learn magic and wield your weapons
